Text.Page: The Consos Clan is preparing a festival in honor of Balder, the God of the Sun.

[Festival of the Sun]
Every year, the Consos Clan hosts a festival for Balder, the God of the Sun. During this time, they ask everyone to assist with the duties of the clergy, such as cleaning the temple.

Because participation is not mandatory, the clergy are prepared to reward those who assist them.

Please demonstrate your devotion to the God of the Sun during this most holy time of year.

Hello, . I am Renmi. It is my pleasure to welcome you to the Festival of the Sun God.

Please, spend some time looking around the Garden of the Sun, and do not hesitate to ask any of the Consos Clan where your assistance is needed.

And when the work at the temple is done, and the sun's flame has been rekindled, there will be a great celebration, to which you are of course invited.
